```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: build
spec:
  initContainers:
  - name: git-sync          ![1](assets/1.png)
    image: k8s.gcr.io/git-sync/git-sync
    args: [
      "--one-time",
      "--depth", "1",
      "--root", "/workspace",
      "--repo", "https://github.com/k8spatterns/random-generator.git",
      "--dest", "main",
      "--branch", "main"]
    volumeMounts:           ![2](assets/2.png)
    - name: source
      mountPath: /workspace
  - name: build             ![3](assets/3.png)
    image: gcr.io/kaniko-project/executor
    args:
    - "--context=dir:///workspace/main/"
    - "--destination=index.docker.io/k8spatterns/random-generator-kaniko"
    - "--image-name-with-digest-file=/workspace/image-name"
    securityContext:
      privileged: false     ![4](assets/4.png)
    volumeMounts:
    - name: kaniko-secret   ![5](assets/5.png)
      mountPath: /kaniko/.docker
    - name: source          ![6](assets/6.png)
      mountPath: /workspace
  containers:
  - name: image-update      ![7](assets/7.png)
    image: k8spatterns/image-updater
    args:
    - "random"
    - "/opt/image-name"
    volumeMounts:
    - name: source
      mountPath: /opt
  volumes:
  - name: kaniko-secret     ![8](assets/8.png)
    secret:
      secretName: registry-creds
      items:
      - key: .dockerconfigjson
        path: config.json
  - name: source            ![9](assets/9.png)
    emptyDir: {}
  serviceAccountName: build-pod  ![10](assets/10.png)
  restartPolicy: Never      ![11](assets/11.png)
```
